pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū anācāraṁ ācaritvā ekamekassa kamme kayiramāne paṭikkosanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena saṅgho sannipatito hoti kenacideva karaṇīyena.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.4_0: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū cīvarakammaṁ karontā ekassa chandaṁ adaṁsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.6_0: “ayaṁ, āvuso, chabbaggiyo bhikkhu ekako āgato, handassa mayaṁ kammaṁ karomā”ti tassa kammaṁ akāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.7_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu yena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.13_0: Sace ca mayaṁ jāneyyāma ‘tuyhaṁ kammaṁ karissatī’ti, na mayaṁ chandaṁ dadeyyāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.14_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.15_0: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū dhammikānaṁ kammānaṁ chandaṁ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṁ āpajjissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.16_2: dhammikānaṁ kammānaṁ chandaṁ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṁ āpajjathā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.19_2: dhammikānaṁ kammānaṁ chandaṁ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṁ āpajjissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.21_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.22.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu dhammikānaṁ kammānaṁ chandaṁ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṁ āpajjeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:2.1.6_0: apalokanakammaṁ ñattikammaṁ ñattidutiyakammaṁ ñatticatutthakammaṁ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena kataṁ,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:2.2.1_0: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññī chandaṁ datvā khiyyati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:2.2.2_0: Dhammakamme vematiko chandaṁ datvā khiyyati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:2.2.3_0: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññī chandaṁ datvā khiyyati, anāpatti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:2.3.2_0: “adhammena vā vaggena vā na kammārahassa vā kammaṁ katan”ti jānanto khiyyati,
